title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 350-2.2 - List of designated food scraps generators
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 350-2.2 - List of designated food scraps generators

State Regulations

The department will maintain a list of all designated
food scraps generators and make the list available on or before June 1 of each
year, beginning in 2021. The department will notify all designated food scraps
generators by June 1 of each year if they are required to comply with some or
all of the requirements in sections
350-2.3, 2.4, and 2.5 of this Part. This
determination shall be based on the department's assessment of the quantity of
food scraps that can be accepted at each organics recycler or intermediary
facility. A designated food scraps generator has until December 31 of the year
they are first placed on the list to comply with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
350-2.2

Adopted

New

York State Register August 11, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 32, eff. 1/1/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
